column2: Farmhand adds {g|Encyclopedia:Athletics}Athletics{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:Lore_Nature}Lore (nature){/g} to the list of her class {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}skills{/g}. She also becomes proficient with scythes and gets a +1 {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} on {g|Encyclopedia:Saving_Throw}Fortitude saving throws{/g}.

column1: If the character already has the class skill, {g|Encyclopedia:Weapon_Proficiency}weapon proficiency{/g} or armor proficiency granted by the selected background from her class during character creation, then the corresponding bonuses from background change to a +1 competence bonus in case of skills, a +1 enhancement bonus in case of weapon proficiency and a –1 {g|Encyclopedia:Armor_Check_Penalty}Armor Check Penalty{/g} reduction in case of armor proficiency.
column2: Pomocník na Statku přidá {g|Encyclopedia:Athletics}Athletics{/g} a {g|Encyclopedia:Lore_Nature}Lore (nature){/g} do seznamu tvých třídních {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}skills{/g}. Také se staneš zběhlým v kosách a získáš +1 {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} k {g|Encyclopedia:Saving_Throw}Fortitude saving throws{/g}.

Lumberjack adds {g|Encyclopedia:Athletics}Athletics{/g} to the list of her class {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}skills{/g}. She also becomes proficient with handaxes, battleaxes and greataxes, and gets a +1 {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} on {g|Encyclopedia:Saving_Throw}Fortitude saving throws{/g}.

column1: If the character already has the class skill, {g|Encyclopedia:Weapon_Proficiency}weapon proficiency{/g} or armor proficiency granted by the selected background from her class during character creation, then the corresponding bonuses from background change to a +1 competence bonus in case of skills, a +1 enhancement bonus in case of weapon proficiency and a –1 {g|Encyclopedia:Armor_Check_Penalty}Armor Check Penalty{/g} reduction in case of armor proficiency.
column2: Dřevorubec přidá {g|Encyclopedia:Athletics}Athletics{/g} do seznamu tvých třídních {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}skills{/g}. Také získáš zběhlost v krátkých sekerách, bojových sekerách a velkých sekerách, a získáš +1 {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} k {g|Encyclopedia:Saving_Throw}Fortitude saving throws{/g}.

Miner adds {g|Encyclopedia:Athletics}Athletics{/g} to the list of her class {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}skills{/g}. She also becomes proficient with light and heavy picks and gets a +1 {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} on {g|Encyclopedia:Saving_Throw}Fortitude saving throws{/g}.

column1: If the character already has the class skill, {g|Encyclopedia:Weapon_Proficiency}weapon proficiency{/g} or armor proficiency granted by the selected background from her class during character creation, then the corresponding bonuses from background change to a +1 competence bonus in case of skills, a +1 enhancement bonus in case of weapon proficiency and a –1 {g|Encyclopedia:Armor_Check_Penalty}Armor Check Penalty{/g} reduction in case of armor proficiency.
column2: Horník přidá {g|Encyclopedia:Athletics}Athletics{/g} do seznamu tvých třídních {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}skills{/g}. Také získáš zběhlost v lehkých a těžkých krumpáčích a +1 {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} k {g|Encyclopedia:Saving_Throw}Fortitude saving throws{/g}.

Smith adds {g|Encyclopedia:Athletics}Athletics{/g} to the list of her class {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}skills{/g}. She also becomes proficient with light hammers and warhammers, and gets a +1 {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} on {g|Encyclopedia:Saving_Throw}Fortitude saving throws{/g}.

column1: If the character already has the class skill, {g|Encyclopedia:Weapon_Proficiency}weapon proficiency{/g} or armor proficiency granted by the selected background from her class during character creation, then the corresponding bonuses from background change to a +1 competence bonus in case of skills, a +1 enhancement bonus in case of weapon proficiency and a –1 {g|Encyclopedia:Armor_Check_Penalty}Armor Check Penalty{/g} reduction in case of armor proficiency.
column2: Kovář přidá {g|Encyclopedia:Athletics}Athletics{/g} do seznamu tvých třídních {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}skills{/g}. Také získáš zběhlost v lehkých kladivech a válečných kladivech a +1 {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} k {g|Encyclopedia:Saving_Throw}Fortitude saving throws{/g}.

Courtier adds {g|Encyclopedia:Persuasion}Persuasion{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:Trickery}Trickery{/g} to the list of her class {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}skills{/g}. She also becomes proficient with rapiers and bucklers.

column1: If the character already has the class skill, {g|Encyclopedia:Weapon_Proficiency}weapon proficiency{/g} or armor proficiency granted by the selected background from her class during character creation, then the corresponding {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonuses{/g} from background change to a +1 competence bonus in case of skills, a +1 enhancement bonus in case of weapon proficiency and a –1 {g|Encyclopedia:Armor_Check_Penalty}Armor Check Penalty{/g} reduction in case of armor proficiency.
column2: Dvořan přidá {g|Encyclopedia:Persuasion}Persuasion{/g} a {g|Encyclopedia:Trickery}Trickery{/g} do seznamu tvých třídních {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}skills{/g}. Také získáš zběhlost v rapírech a malých štítech.

Emissary adds {g|Encyclopedia:Persuasion}Persuasion{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:Knowledge_World}Knowledge (world){/g} to the list of her class {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}skills{/g}. She also becomes proficient with rapiers and bucklers.

column1: If the character already has the class skill, {g|Encyclopedia:Weapon_Proficiency}weapon proficiency{/g} or armor proficiency granted by the selected background from her class during character creation, then the corresponding {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonuses{/g} from background change to a +1 competence bonus in case of skills, a +1 enhancement bonus in case of weapon proficiency and a –1 {g|Encyclopedia:Armor_Check_Penalty}Armor Check Penalty{/g} reduction in case of armor proficiency.
column2: Vyslanec přidá {g|Encyclopedia:Persuasion}Persuasion{/g} a {g|Encyclopedia:Knowledge_World}Knowledge (world){/g} do seznamu tvých třídních {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}skills{/g}. Také získáš zběhlost v rapírech a malých štítech.
Leader adds {g|Encyclopedia:Persuasion}Persuasion{/g} to the list of her class {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}skills{/g}. She also becomes proficient with rapiers, longswords, greatswords and bucklers.

column1: If the character already has the class skill, {g|Encyclopedia:Weapon_Proficiency}weapon proficiency{/g} or armor proficiency granted by the selected background from her class during character creation, then the corresponding {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonuses{/g} from background change to a +1 competence bonus in case of skills, a +1 enhancement bonus in case of weapon proficiency and a –1 {g|Encyclopedia:Armor_Check_Penalty}Armor Check Penalty{/g} reduction in case of armor proficiency.
column2: Vůdce přidá {g|Encyclopedia:Persuasion}Persuasion{/g} do seznamu tvých třídních {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}skills{/g}. Také získáš zběhlost v rapírech, dlouhých mečích, velkých mečích a malých štítech.

Acolyte adds {g|Encyclopedia:Persuasion}Persuasion{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:Lore_Religion}Lore (religion){/g} to the list of her class {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}skills{/g}. She can also use her {g|Encyclopedia:Wisdom}Wisdom{/g} instead of {g|Encyclopedia:Charisma}Charisma{/g} while attempting Persuasion {g|Encyclopedia:Check}checks{/g}.

column1: If the character already has the class skill, {g|Encyclopedia:Weapon_Proficiency}weapon proficiency{/g} or armor proficiency granted by the selected background from her class during character creation, then the corresponding {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonuses{/g} from background change to a +1 competence bonus in case of skills, a +1 enhancement bonus in case of weapon proficiency and a –1 {g|Encyclopedia:Armor_Check_Penalty}Armor Check Penalty{/g} reduction in case of armor proficiency.
column2: Akolyta přidá {g|Encyclopedia:Persuasion}Persuasion{/g} a {g|Encyclopedia:Lore_Religion}Lore (religion){/g} do seznamu tvých třídních {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}skills{/g}. Můžeš také použít svou {g|Encyclopedia:Wisdom}Wisdom{/g} místo {g|Encyclopedia:Charisma}Charisma{/g} při pokusech o Persuasion {g|Encyclopedia:Check}checks{/g}.

Healer adds {g|Encyclopedia:Lore_Nature}Lore (nature){/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:Lore_Religion}Lore (religion){/g} to the list of her class {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}skills{/g}. She can also use her {g|Encyclopedia:Intelligence}Intelligence{/g} instead of {g|Encyclopedia:Wisdom}Wisdom{/g} while attempting Lore (nature) or Lore (religion) {g|Encyclopedia:Check}checks{/g}.

column1: If the character already has the class skill, {g|Encyclopedia:Weapon_Proficiency}weapon proficiency{/g} or armor proficiency granted by the selected background from her class during character creation, then the corresponding {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonuses{/g} from background change to a +1 competence bonus in case of skills, a +1 enhancement bonus in case of weapon proficiency and a –1 {g|Encyclopedia:Armor_Check_Penalty}Armor Check Penalty{/g} reduction in case of armor proficiency.
column2: Léčitel přidá {g|Encyclopedia:Lore_Nature}Lore (nature){/g} a {g|Encyclopedia:Lore_Religion}Lore (religion){/g} do seznamu tvých třídních {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}skills{/g}. Můžeš také použít svou {g|Encyclopedia:Intelligence}Intelligence{/g} místo {g|Encyclopedia:Wisdom}Wisdom{/g} při pokusech o Lore (nature) nebo Lore (religion) {g|Encyclopedia:Check}checks{/g}.

Martial Disciple adds {g|Encyclopedia:Mobility}Mobility{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:Lore_Religion}Lore (religion){/g} to the list of her class {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}skills{/g}. She also gains Improved Unarmed Strike as a background {g|Encyclopedia:Feat}feat{/g}.

column1: If the character already has the class skill, {g|Encyclopedia:Weapon_Proficiency}weapon proficiency{/g} or armor proficiency granted by the selected background from her class during character creation, then the corresponding {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonuses{/g} from background change to a +1 competence bonus in case of skills, a +1 enhancement bonus in case of weapon proficiency and a –1 {g|Encyclopedia:Armor_Check_Penalty}Armor Check Penalty{/g} reduction in case of armor proficiency.
column2: Bojový Žák přidá {g|Encyclopedia:Mobility}Mobility{/g} a {g|Encyclopedia:Lore_Religion}Lore (religion){/g} do seznamu tvých třídních {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}skills{/g}. Také získáš Improved Unarmed Strike jako pozadí {g|Encyclopedia:Feat}feat{/g}.
This island is affected by a magical undertow flowing beneath it. The elements, tainted by the energies of the Abyss, rage on this island.

column1: Roaring gale: all {g|Encyclopedia:RangedAttack}ranged attacks{/g} made against targets more than 30 feet away suffer a –4 {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g} on {g|Encyclopedia:Attack}attack rolls{/g}.

Lightning strikes: periodically, a random creature on the island is struck by a lightning that deals {g|Encyclopedia:Dice}10d8{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Energy_Damage}electricity damage{/g}. A successful {g|Encyclopedia:Saving_Throw}Reflex save{/g} reduces the damage by half.

Whenever a creature on this island casts a {g|Encyclopedia:Spell}spell{/g} with electricity {g|Encyclopedia:Spell_Descriptor}descriptor{/g}, that spell's {g|Encyclopedia:Caster_Level}caster level{/g} is increased by 2.
column2: Tento ostrov je postižen magickým podproudem tekoucím pod ním. Elementy, zkažené energiemi Propasti, zde zuří.

A metamorph gains the ability to transform herself into another form. The effect lasts for 1 hour per metamorph's alchemist level, or until she changes back. Changing form (to another form or back) is a {g|Encyclopedia:Standard_Actions}standard action{/g} that doesn't provoke {g|Encyclopedia:Attack_Of_Opportunity}attacks of opportunity{/g}. The metamorph is {g|ConditionFatigued}fatigued{/g} for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Combat_Round}round{/g} each time she changes shape.

column1: A metamorph can use this ability twice per day at 4th level and an additional time per day every 2 alchemist levels thereafter, for a total of ten times at 20th level.

This ability functions as {g|SpellsBeastShapeI}beast shape I{/g} at 4th level, as {g|SpellsBeastShapeII}beast shape II{/g} at 9th level, as {g|SpellsBeastShapeIII}beast shape III{/g} at 11th level, as {g|SpellsBeastShapeIV}beast shape IV{/g} or {g|SpellsDragonkindI}dragonkind I{/g} at 13th level, and as {g|SpellsDragonkindII}dragonkind II{/g} at 15th level.
This ability replaces alchemy (which also includes bombs, extracts, and mutagen) and Throw Anything.
column2: Metamorf získává schopnost proměnit se do jiné podoby. Účinek trvá 1 hodinu na každou úroveň alchymisty metamorfa, nebo dokud se nevrátí zpět. Změna podoby (do jiné nebo zpět) je {g|Encyclopedia:Standard_Actions}standard action{/g}, která nevyvolává {g|Encyclopedia:Attack_Of_Opportunity}attacks of opportunity{/g}. Metamorf je {g|ConditionFatigued}fatigued{/g} na 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Combat_Round}round{/g} pokaždé, když změní podobu.
At 11th level, a reanimator adds {g|SpellsCreateUndead}create undead{/g} to his formula book as a 4th-level extract.

column1: In addition, each undead creature raised by the reanimator gains a +6 alchemical {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} to its {g|Encyclopedia:Strength}Strength{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:Charisma}Charisma{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Ability_Scores}ability scores{/g} for the duration of the {g|Encyclopedia:Spell}spell{/g} that raised it.
column2: Na 11. úrovni reanimátor přidá {g|SpellsCreateUndead}create undead{/g} do své knihy formulí jako 4.úrovňový extrakt.
At 5th level, a reanimator adds lesser {g|SpellsAnimateDead}animate dead{/g} to his formula book as a 2nd-level extract.

column1: In addition, each undead creature raised by the reanimator gains a +4 alchemical {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} to its {g|Encyclopedia:Strength}Strength{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:Charisma}Charisma{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Ability_Scores}ability scores{/g} for the duration of the {g|Encyclopedia:Spell}spell{/g} that raised it.
column2: Na 5. úrovni reanimátor přidá lesser {g|SpellsAnimateDead}animate dead{/g} do své knihy formulí jako 2.úrovňový extrakt.

When an alchemist creates a bomb, he can choose to have it deliver one of the four powerful curses. A creature that takes a direct hit from a cursed bomb must succeed at a {g|Encyclopedia:Saving_Throw}Will save{/g} or be affected by one of the following curses:

column1: Curse of Feeble Body — the subject suffers a –6 {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g} to {g|Encyclopedia:Constitution}Constitution{/g} score.
Curse of Weakness — the subject suffers a –6 penalty to {g|Encyclopedia:Strength}Strength{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:Dexterity}Dexterity{/g} scores.
Curse of Idiocy — the subject suffers a –6 penalty to {g|Encyclopedia:Intelligence}Intelligence{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:Wisdom}Wisdom{/g}, and {g|Encyclopedia:Charisma}Charisma{/g} scores.

Curse of Deterioration — the subject suffers a –4 penalty on {g|Encyclopedia:Attack}attack rolls{/g}, saves, {g|Encyclopedia:Ability_Scores}ability{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Check}checks{/g}, and {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}skill{/g} checks.
column2: Když jako alchymista vytvoříš bombu, můžeš zvolit, aby doručila jedno ze čtyř mocných prokletí. Stvoření, které je přímým cílem prokleté bomby, musí uspět na {g|Encyclopedia:Saving_Throw}Will save{/g} nebo podléhá jednomu z následujících prokletí:

Assassins specialize in poison use. Each day, they can create 6 + assassin level ×2 doses of special combat poisons, which they can use to envenom their melee weapons. As a {g|Encyclopedia:Move_Action}move action{/g}, an assassin can apply one of the poisons to his melee weapon, and the next successful {g|Encyclopedia:Attack}attack{/g} applies it to the target. The {g|Encyclopedia:Saving_Throw}save{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:DC}DC{/g} of the assassin's poisons is 10 + his assassin level + his {g|Encyclopedia:Intelligence}Int{/g} modifier. If the attack that applies the poison is a sneak attack, the DC is increased by 2. If the target is affected by the assassin's mark of death ability, it must make two saving throws against his poisons and take the worse result.

column1: At 2nd level, the assassin gains access to poisons that deal {g|Encyclopedia:Dice}1d4{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:AbilityDamage}stat damage{/g} to {g|Encyclopedia:Strength}Strength{/g} or {g|Encyclopedia:Dexterity}Dexterity{/g} for 4 {g|Encyclopedia:Combat_Round}rounds{/g}.
At 3rd level, the duration of the assassin's poisons increases by 1 round.
At 4th level, the assassin gains access to a poison that deals {g|Encyclopedia:Constitution}Constitution{/g} damage.
At 5th level, the number of successful saving throws needed to remove the assassin's poisons increases to 2.
At 6th level, the duration of the assassin's poisons increases by 1 round.
At 7th level, the assassin can apply his poisons as a move or a {g|Encyclopedia:Swift_Action}swift action{/g}.
At 8th level, the duration of the assassin's poisons increases by 1 round.
At 9th level, the number of successful saving throws needed to remove the assassin's poisons increases to 3.
At 10th level, the target of the assassin's poison takes one round of ability damage from the poison on a successful Fortitude save.
column2: Assassins specialize in poison use. Each day, they can create 6 + assassin level ×2 doses of special combat poisons, which they can use to envenom their melee weapons. As a {g|Encyclopedia:Move_Action}move action{/g}, an assassin can apply one of the poisons to his melee weapon, and the next successful {g|Encyclopedia:Attack}attack{/g} applies it to the target. The {g|Encyclopedia:Saving_Throw}save{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:DC}DC{/g} of the assassin's poisons is 10 + his assassin level + his {g|Encyclopedia:Intelligence}Int{/g} modifier. If the attack that applies the poison is a sneak attack, the DC is increased by 2. If the target is affected by the assassin's mark of death ability, it must make two saving throws against his poisons and take the worse result.

An instinctual warrior can call upon inner reserves of strength and ferocity, granting her additional combat prowess. At 1st level, an instinctual warrior can rage for a number of {g|Encyclopedia:Combat_Round}rounds{/g} per day equal to 4 + her {g|Encyclopedia:Wisdom}Wisdom{/g} modifier. For each level after 1st she possesses, the barbarian can rage for 2 additional rounds per day. Temporary increases to Wisdom do not increase the total number of rounds that an instinctual warrior can rage per day. An instinctual warrior can enter a rage as a {g|Encyclopedia:Free_Action}free action{/g}. The total number of rounds of rage per day is renewed after {g|Encyclopedia:Rest}resting{/g} for 8 hours, although these hours need not be consecutive.

column1: While in a rage, an instinctual warrior gains a +2 {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} on {g|Encyclopedia:Attack}attack rolls{/g} and Wisdom. In addition, she gains 2 {g|Encyclopedia:Temporary_HP}temporary hit points{/g} per {g|Encyclopedia:Hit_Dice}Hit Die{/g}. These temporary hit points are lost first when a character takes {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage{/g}, disappear when the rage ends, and are not replenished if the barbarian enters a rage again within 1 minute of her previous rage. While in a rage, an instinctual warrior cannot cast {g|Encyclopedia:Spell}spells{/g}.

An instinctual warrior can end her rage as a free action, and is {g|ConditionFatigued}fatigued{/g} for 1 minute after a rage ends. An instinctual warrior can't enter a new rage while fatigued or {g|ConditionExhausted}exhausted{/g}, but can otherwise enter a rage multiple times per day. If an instinctual warrior falls {g|Encyclopedia:Injury_Death}unconscious{/g}, her rage immediately ends.
column2: Zuřivost můžeš ukončit jako free action a jsi po zuřivosti {g|ConditionFatigued}fatigued{/g} po dobu 1 minuty. Nemůžeš vstoupit do nové zuřivosti, dokud jsi unavený nebo {g|ConditionExhausted}exhausted{/g}, jinak můžeš za den zuřit opakovaně. Pokud upadneš {g|Encyclopedia:Injury_Death}unconscious{/g}, tvá zuřivost okamžitě končí.
At 5th level, a mad dog's war beast gains Trip as a bonus {g|Encyclopedia:Feat}feat{/g}.

column1: Trip: This feat gives the character an ability to perform the trip {g|Encyclopedia:Combat_Maneuvers}combat maneuver{/g}. It also grants a +2 {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} to {g|Encyclopedia:CMB}CMB{/g} when performing this maneuver, and a +2 bonus to {g|Encyclopedia:CMD}CMD{/g} when defending against it.
You can attempt to trip your opponent in place of a {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttack}melee attack{/g}. If your combat maneuver is successful, the target is knocked {g|ConditionProne}prone{/g}.

If the target has more than two legs, add +2 to the {g|Encyclopedia:DC}DC{/g} of the combat maneuver {g|Encyclopedia:Attack}attack roll{/g} for each additional leg it has. Some creatures — such as oozes, creatures without legs, and flying creatures — cannot be tripped.
column2: Pokud má cíl víc než dvě nohy, přičti +2 k {g|Encyclopedia:DC}DC{/g} hodu útoku pro každý další pár nohou. Některé tvory — například oozes, tvory bez nohou a létající tvory — nelze shodit.

At 7th level, while a pack rager is raging, she grants a single teamwork {g|Encyclopedia:Feat}feat{/g} she has to all allies within 50 feet who can see and hear her. She chooses the feat at the start of the rage, and cannot change it during the rage. An ally who moves more than 50 feet away from the raging pack rager loses access to the feat, but regains it again each time he moves back within 50 feet of the raging pack rager. Allies do not need to meet the prerequisites of these teamwork feats.

column1: At 13th level, the pack rager chooses two teamwork feats when she enters a rage, and grants her allies the use of both of those feats when they are within 50 feet of her.
At 19th level, the pack rager chooses three teamwork feats when she enters a rage, and grants her allies the use of all three feats when they are within 50 feet of her.
column2: Na 19. úrovni volíš při vstupu do zuřivosti tři týmové featy a uděluješ spojencům možnost použít všechny tři, pokud jsou do 50 stop od tebe.

A barbarian can call upon inner reserves of strength and ferocity, granting her additional combat prowess. At 1st level, a barbarian can rage for a number of {g|Encyclopedia:Combat_Round}rounds{/g} per day equal to 4 + her {g|Encyclopedia:Constitution}Constitution{/g} modifier. For each level after 1st she possesses, the barbarian can rage for 2 additional rounds per day. Temporary increases to Constitution, such as that gained from {g|SpellsBearsEndurance}bear's endurance{/g}, do not increase the total number of rounds that a barbarian can rage per day. A barbarian can enter a rage as a {g|Encyclopedia:Free_Action}free action{/g}. The total number of rounds of rage per day is renewed after {g|Encyclopedia:Rest}resting{/g} for 8 hours, although these hours need not be consecutive.

column1: While in a rage, a barbarian gains a +2 {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} on {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttack}melee attack{/g} rolls, melee {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage rolls{/g}, thrown weapon damage rolls, and {g|Encyclopedia:Saving_Throw}Will saving throws{/g}. In addition, she takes a –2 {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g} to {g|Encyclopedia:Armor_Class}Armor Class{/g}. She also gains 2 {g|Encyclopedia:Temporary_HP}temporary hit points{/g} per {g|Encyclopedia:Hit_Dice}Hit Die{/g}. These temporary hit points are lost first when a character takes damage, disappear when the rage ends, and are not replenished if the barbarian enters a rage again within 1 minute of her previous rage. While in a rage, a barbarian cannot cast {g|Encyclopedia:Spell}spells{/g}.

A barbarian can end her rage as a free action, and is {g|ConditionFatigued}fatigued{/g} for 1 minute after a rage ends. A barbarian can't enter a new rage while fatigued or {g|ConditionExhausted}exhausted{/g}, but can otherwise enter a rage multiple times per day. If a barbarian falls {g|Encyclopedia:Injury_Death}unconscious{/g}, her rage immediately ends.
column2: Zuřivost můžeš ukončit jako free action a jsi po zuřivosti {g|ConditionFatigued}fatigued{/g} po dobu 1 minuty. Nemůžeš vstoupit do nové zuřivosti, dokud jsi unavený nebo {g|ConditionExhausted}exhausted{/g}, jinak můžeš za den zuřit opakovaně. Pokud upadneš {g|Encyclopedia:Injury_Death}unconscious{/g}, tvá zuřivost okamžitě končí.

Each bloodrager has a source of magic somewhere in his heritage that empowers his bloodrages, bonus {g|Encyclopedia:Feat}feats{/g}, and bonus {g|Encyclopedia:Spell}spells{/g}. Sometimes this source reflects a distant blood relationship to a powerful being, or is due to an extreme event involving such a creature somewhere in his family's past. Regardless of the source, this influence manifests in a number of ways. A bloodrager must pick one bloodline upon taking his first level of bloodrager. Once made, this choice cannot be changed.

column1: The bloodrager gains bloodline powers at 1st level, 4th level, and every 4 levels thereafter. The bloodline powers a bloodrager gains are described in his chosen bloodline. For all spell-like bloodline powers, treat the character's bloodrager level as the {g|Encyclopedia:Caster_Level}caster level{/g}.

At 6th level and every 3 levels thereafter, a bloodrager receives one bonus feat chosen from a list specific to each bloodline. The bloodrager must meet the prerequisites for these bonus feats. At 7th, 10th, 13th, and 16th levels, a bloodrager learns an additional spell derived from his bloodline.
If the bloodrager takes levels in another class that grants a bloodline, the bloodlines must be the same type.
column2: Každý bloodrager má ve svém dědictví zdroj magie, který posiluje jeho bloodrage, poskytuje bonusové {g|Encyclopedia:Feat}feats{/g} a bonusová {g|Encyclopedia:Spell}kouzla{/g}. Někdy tento zdroj odráží vzdálené příbuzenské pouto k mocné bytosti, jindy je výsledkem extrémní události s takovým stvořením kdesi v minulosti jeho rodu. Ať už je zdroj jakýkoli, tento vliv se projevuje různými způsoby. Bloodrager si při získání první úrovně bloodragera musí zvolit jednu krvnou linii. Jakmile je volba učiněna, nelze ji změnit.

At 5th level, a hag-riven can, as a {g|Encyclopedia:Swift_Action}swift action{/g}, grant her claws a +1 enhancement {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g}. This bonus stacks with existing enhancement bonuses (such as those provided by {g|SpellsMagicFang}magic fang{/g} or magic items) to a maximum of +5. This bonus increases to +2 at 7th level, +3 at 10th level, and +4 at 13th level.

column1: Beginning at 7th level, the hag-riven can sacrifice one point of the bonus provided by her sorcerous claws to add any of the following weapon properties to her claws: {g|EnhancementCorrosive}corrosive{/g}, {g|EnhancementFlaming}flaming{/g}, {g|EnhancementFrost}frost{/g}, {g|EnhancementKeen}keen{/g}, {g|EnhancementShocking}shock{/g}, or {g|EnhancementVicious}vicious{/g}.

Beginning at 10th level, the hag-riven can sacrifice two points of the bonus provided by her sorcerous claws to add any of the following weapon properties to her claws: {g|EnhancementAnarchic}anarchic{/g}, {g|EnhancementCorrosiveBurst}corrosive burst{/g}, {g|EnhancementFlamingBurst}flaming burst{/g}, {g|EnhancementIcyBurst}icy burst{/g}, {g|EnhancementShockingBurst}shocking burst{/g}, or {g|EnhancementUnholy}unholy{/g}.

Beginning at 13th level, the hag-riven can sacrifice three points of the bonus provided by her sorcerous claws to add any of the following weapon properties to her claws: {g|EnhancementNullifying}nullifying{/g} or {g|EnhancementSpeed}speed{/g}.
Her claws must have a minimum enhancement bonus of +1 before any special abilities can be added.
column2: Na 5. úrovni může hag-riven jako {g|Encyclopedia:Swift_Action}swift action{/g} obdařit své drápy +1 vylepšovacím {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonusem{/g}. Tento bonus se sčítá s existujícími vylepšovacími bonusy (např. těmi od {g|SpellsMagicFang}magic fang{/g} nebo magických předmětů) až do maxima +5. Tento bonus se zvyšuje na +2 na 7. úrovni, +3 na 10. úrovni a +4 na 13. úrovni.

A {g|Encyclopedia:Alignment}good{/g} cleric (or a neutral cleric who worships a good deity) channels positive energy and can choose to deal {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage{/g} to undead creatures or to {g|Encyclopedia:Healing}heal{/g} living creatures.

column1: Channeling energy causes a burst that either heals all living creatures or damages all undead creatures in a 30-foot radius centered on the cleric. The amount of damage dealt or healed is equal to {g|Encyclopedia:Dice}1d6{/g} points of damage plus 1d6 points of damage for every two cleric levels beyond 1st (2d6 at 3rd, 3d6 at 5th, and so on). Creatures that take damage from channeled energy receive a {g|Encyclopedia:Saving_Throw}Will save{/g} to halve the damage. The {g|Encyclopedia:DC}DC{/g} of this save is equal to 10 + 1/2 the cleric's level + the cleric's {g|Encyclopedia:Charisma}Charisma{/g} modifier. Creatures healed by channel energy cannot exceed their maximum {g|Encyclopedia:HP}hit point{/g} total — all excess healing is lost. A cleric may channel energy a number of times per day equal to 3 + her Charisma modifier.

This is a {g|Encyclopedia:Standard_Actions}standard action{/g} that does not provoke an {g|Encyclopedia:Attack_Of_Opportunity}attack of opportunity{/g}. A cleric can choose whether or not to include herself in this effect.

A good cleric (or a neutral cleric of a good deity) can also channel stored {g|Encyclopedia:Spell}spell{/g} energy into healing spells that she did not prepare ahead of time. The cleric can "lose" any prepared spell that is not an {g|Encyclopedia:Cantrips_Orisons}orison{/g} or domain spell in order to cast any cure spell of the same spell level or lower (a cure spell is any spell with "cure" in its name).
column2: Dobrý kněz (nebo neutrální kněz, který uctívá dobré božstvo) kanáluje pozitivní energii a může zvolit, zda způsobí {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}poškození{/g} nemrtvým tvorům, nebo {g|Encyclopedia:Healing}uzdraví{/g} živé.

A separatist selects one domain from her deity's domain list, and a second domain that is not on her deity's domain list. This second domain cannot be an {g|Encyclopedia:Alignment}alignment{/g} domain that doesn't match the cleric's or her deity's alignment. For example, a lawful good separatist cleric of a neutral good deity cannot choose the Chaos or Evil domain with this ability, but can select the Law domain even though her deity isn't lawful.

column1: Granted powers from the cleric's second domain function as if the cleric's level, {g|Encyclopedia:Wisdom}Wisdom{/g}, and {g|Encyclopedia:Charisma}Charisma{/g} were 2 lower than normal (minimum level 1) in terms of effect, {g|Encyclopedia:DC}DC{/g}, and uses per day. This also means the separatist doesn't gain the domain's higher-level ability until 2 levels later than normal. If the second domain grants additional class {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}skills{/g}, the separatist gains these as normal.
In all other respects, this ability works like and replaces the standard cleric's domain ability.
column2: Ve všech ostatních ohledech tato schopnost funguje stejně jako a nahrazuje standardní doménovou schopnost kněze.
You can speak with and befriend animals with ease. In addition, you treat {g|Encyclopedia:Lore_Nature}Lore (nature){/g} as a class {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}skill{/g}.

column1: Animal Companion: At 6th level, you gain the service of an animal companion. Your effective druid level for this animal companion is equal to your level in the class that gave you access to this domain –3. (Druids who take this ability through their nature bond class feature use their druid level –3 to determine the abilities of their animal companions.)

Domain {g|Encyclopedia:Spell}Spells{/g}: {g|SpellsMagicFang}magic fang{/g}, {g|SpellsHoldAnimal}hold animal{/g}, {g|SpellsDominateAnimal}dominate animal{/g}, {g|SpellsSummonNaturesAllyIV}summon nature's ally IV{/g}, {g|SpellsBeastShapeIII}beast shape III{/g}, {g|SpellsSummonNaturesAllyVI}summon nature's ally VI{/g}, {g|SpellsAnimalShapes}animal shapes{/g}, {g|SpellsSummonNaturesAllyVIII}summon nature's ally VIII{/g}, {g|SpellsShapechange}shapechange{/g}.
column2: Doménová kouzla: {g|SpellsMagicFang}magic fang{/g}, {g|SpellsHoldAnimal}hold animal{/g}, {g|SpellsDominateAnimal}dominate animal{/g}, {g|SpellsSummonNaturesAllyIV}summon nature's ally IV{/g}, {g|SpellsBeastShapeIII}beast shape III{/g}, {g|SpellsSummonNaturesAllyVI}summon nature's ally VI{/g}, {g|SpellsAnimalShapes}animal shapes{/g}, {g|SpellsSummonNaturesAllyVIII}summon nature's ally VIII{/g}, {g|SpellsShapechange}shapechange{/g}.
You can manipulate lightning, mist, and wind, and are {g|Encyclopedia:Energy_Resistance}resistant{/g} to {g|Encyclopedia:Energy_Damage}electricity damage{/g}.

column1: Lightning Arc: As a {g|Encyclopedia:Standard_Actions}standard action{/g}, you can unleash an arc of electricity targeting any foe within 30 feet as a ranged {g|Encyclopedia:TouchAttack}touch attack{/g}. This arc of electricity deals {g|Encyclopedia:Dice}1d6{/g} points of electricity damage + 1 point for every two levels you possess in the class that gave you access to this domain. You can use this ability a number of times per day equal to 3 + your {g|Encyclopedia:Wisdom}Wisdom{/g} modifier.

Electricity Resistance: At 6th level, you gain resist electricity 10. This resistance increases to 20 at 12th level. At 20th level, you gain {g|Encyclopedia:Energy_Immunity}immunity{/g} to electricity.

Domain {g|Encyclopedia:Spell}Spells{/g}: {g|SpellsShockingGrasp}shocking grasp{/g}, {g|SpellsProtectionFromArrows}protection from arrows{/g}, {g|SpellsLightningBolt}lightning bolt{/g}, {g|SpellsShout}shout{/g}, {g|SpellsCloudkill}cloudkill{/g}, {g|SpellsChainLightning}chain lightning{/g}, {g|SpellsElementalBodyIVAir}elemental body IV (air){/g}, {g|SpellsGreaterShout}shout, greater{/g}, {g|SpellsElementalSwarmAir}elemental swarm (air){/g}.
column2: Doménová kouzla: {g|SpellsShockingGrasp}shocking grasp{/g}, {g|SpellsProtectionFromArrows}protection from arrows{/g}, {g|SpellsLightningBolt}lightning bolt{/g}, {g|SpellsShout}shout{/g}, {g|SpellsCloudkill}cloudkill{/g}, {g|SpellsChainLightning}chain lightning{/g}, {g|SpellsElementalBodyIVAir}elemental body IV (air){/g}, {g|SpellsGreaterShout}shout, greater{/g}, {g|SpellsElementalSwarmAir}elemental swarm (air){/g}.
You can speak with and befriend animals with ease. In addition, you treat {g|Encyclopedia:Lore_Nature}Lore (nature){/g} as a class {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}skill{/g}.

column1: Animal Companion: At 4th level, you gain the service of an animal companion. Your effective druid level for this animal companion is equal to your level in the class that gave you access to this domain –3. (Druids who take this ability through their nature bond class feature use their druid level –3 to determine the abilities of their animal companions.)

Domain {g|Encyclopedia:Spell}Spells{/g}: {g|SpellsMagicFang}magic fang{/g}, {g|SpellsHoldAnimal}hold animal{/g}, {g|SpellsDominateAnimal}dominate animal{/g}, {g|SpellsSummonNaturesAllyIV}summon nature's ally IV{/g}, {g|SpellsBeastShapeIII}beast shape III{/g}, {g|SpellsSummonNaturesAllyVI}summon nature's ally VI{/g}, {g|SpellsAnimalShapes}animal shapes{/g}, {g|SpellsSummonNaturesAllyVIII}summon nature's ally VIII{/g}, {g|SpellsShapechange}shapechange{/g}.
column2: Můžeš snadno mluvit se zvířaty a získat si jejich přízeň. Navíc považuješ {g|Encyclopedia:Lore_Nature}Lore (nature){/g} za třídní {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}skill{/g}.
You can repair damage to objects, animate objects with life, and create objects from nothing.

column1: Aura of Efficiency

You can emit a 30-foot-radius aura that grants your allies a +4 {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} on all {g|Encyclopedia:Saving_Throw}saving throws{/g} against effects that inflict the {g|ConditionFatigued}fatigued{/g} or {g|ConditionExhausted}exhausted{/g} condition. You can use this aura for a number of {g|Encyclopedia:Combat_Round}rounds{/g} per day equal to your level in the class that gave you access to this domain. These rounds do not need to be consecutive.
Aura of Efficiency: Damage Resistance

At 8th level, your Aura of Efficiency grants your allies {g|Encyclopedia:Damage_Reduction}DR{/g} 1/—. This DR increases by +1/— for every three levels you possess in the class that gave you access to this domain beyond 8th.
column2: Můžeš opravovat poškození předmětů, oživovat předměty a tvořit předměty z ničeho.
You can repair damage to objects, animate objects with life, and create objects from nothing.

column1: Aura of Efficiency

You can emit a 30-foot-radius aura that grants your allies a +4 {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} on all {g|Encyclopedia:Saving_Throw}saving throws{/g} against effects that inflict the {g|ConditionFatigued}fatigued{/g} or {g|ConditionExhausted}exhausted{/g} condition. You can use this aura for a number of {g|Encyclopedia:Combat_Round}rounds{/g} per day equal to your level in the class that gave you access to this domain. These rounds do not need to be consecutive.
Aura of Efficiency: Damage Resistance

At 8th level, your Aura of Efficiency grants your allies {g|Encyclopedia:Damage_Reduction}DR{/g} 1/—. This DR increases by +1/— for every three levels you possess in the class that gave you access to this domain beyond 8th.

Domain {g|Encyclopedia:Spell}Spells{/g}: {g|SpellsLeadBlades}lead blades{/g}, {g|SpellsEffortlessArmor}effortless armor{/g}, {g|SpellsMagicalVestment}magical vestment{/g}, {g|SpellsRestoration}restoration{/g}, {g|SpellsWavesOfFatigue}waves of fatigue{/g}, {g|SpellsDisintegrate}disintegrate{/g}, {g|SpellsWavesOfExhaustion}waves of exhaustion{/g}, {g|SpellsProtectionFromSpells}protection from spells{/g}, {g|SpellsClashingRocks}clashing rocks{/g}.
column2: Můžeš opravovat poškození předmětů, oživovat předměty a tvořit předměty z ničeho.
You are a scholar and a sage of legends. In addition, you treat all Knowledge and Lore skills as class {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}skills{/g}.

column1: Void Form: You can become semi-tangible as a {g|Encyclopedia:Standard_Actions}standard action{/g}. While in this form, you are immune to {g|Encyclopedia:Critical}critical hits{/g} and gain a +1 deflection {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} to {g|Encyclopedia:Armor_Class}AC{/g}. This bonus increases by 1 at 8th level and every 4 levels thereafter. You can use this power a number of {g|Encyclopedia:Combat_Round}rounds{/g} per day equal to your level in the class that gave you access to this domain.

Teaching Moment: At 8th level as a {g|Encyclopedia:Swift_Action}swift action{/g} you can grant all allies within 30 feet special insights. Once during the next minute, each affected creature can choose to {g|Encyclopedia:Dice}roll{/g} twice and take the better result before attempting an {g|Encyclopedia:Attack}attack roll{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:Ability_Scores}ability{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Check}check{/g}, skill check, or {g|Encyclopedia:Saving_Throw}saving throw{/g}. You can use this ability once per day at 8th level, and one additional time per day for every 4 levels in the class that gave you access to this domain beyond 8th.

Domain {g|Encyclopedia:Spell}Spells{/g}: {g|SpellsTrueStrike}true strike{/g}, {g|SpellsFoxsCunning}fox's cunning{/g}, {g|SpellsCommunalSeeInvisibility}see invisibility, communal{/g}, {g|SpellsDeathWard}death ward{/g}, {g|SpellsTrueSeeing}true seeing{/g}, {g|SpellsMassFoxsCunning}fox's cunning, mass{/g}, {g|SpellsPowerWordBlind}power word blind{/g}, {g|SpellsPowerWordStun}power word stun{/g}, {g|SpellsPowerWordKill}power word kill{/g}.
column2: Jsi učenec a mudrc legend. Navíc považuješ všechny dovednosti Knowledge a Lore za třídní {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}skills{/g}.
You are a great leader, an inspiration to all who follow the teachings of your faith.

column1: Inspiring Word: As a {g|Encyclopedia:Standard_Actions}standard action{/g}, you can speak an inspiring word to a creature within 30 feet. That creature receives a +2 morale {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} on {g|Encyclopedia:Attack}attack rolls{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}skill{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Check}checks{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:Ability_Scores}ability{/g} checks, and {g|Encyclopedia:Saving_Throw}saving throws{/g} for a number of {g|Encyclopedia:Combat_Round}rounds{/g} equal to 1/2 your level in the class that gave you access to this domain (minimum 1). You can use this power a number of times per day equal to 3 + your {g|Encyclopedia:Wisdom}Wisdom{/g} modifier.

Inspiring Command: At 8th level, you can issue an inspiring command to your allies, who must all be within 30 feet of you. Affected allies gain a +2 insight bonus on attack rolls, {g|Encyclopedia:Armor_Class}AC{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:CMD}Combat Maneuver Defense{/g}, and skill checks for a number of rounds equal to 1/2 your level in the class that gave you access to this domain (minimum 1). You can use this power a number of times per day equal to 3 + your Wisdom modifier.

Domain {g|Encyclopedia:Spell}Spells{/g}: {g|SpellsDivineFavor}divine favor{/g}, {g|SpellsGrace}grace{/g}, {g|SpellsMagicalVestment}magical vestment{/g}, {g|SpellsHeroism}heroism{/g}, {g|SpellsDominatePerson}dominate person{/g}, {g|SpellsBrilliantInspiration}brilliant inspiration{/g}, {g|SpellsGreaterHeroism}heroism, greater{/g}, {g|SpellsFrightfulAspect}frightful aspect{/g}, {g|SpellsOverwhelmingPresence}overwhelming presence{/g}.
column2: Jsi velký vůdce, inspirace všem, kdo následují učení tvé víry.
You find solace in the green, can grow defensive thorns, and can communicate with plants.

column1: Enlarge: As a {g|Encyclopedia:Swift_Action}swift action{/g} you can enlarge yourself for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Combat_Round}round{/g}, as if you were the target of the {g|SpellsEnlargePerson}enlarge person{/g} spell. You can use this power a number of times per day equal to 3 + your {g|Encyclopedia:Wisdom}Wisdom{/g} modifier.

Bramble Armor: At 6th level, you can cause a host of wooden thorns to burst from your skin as a {g|Encyclopedia:Free_Action}free action{/g}. While bramble armor is in effect, any foe striking you with a melee weapon without {g|Encyclopedia:Reach}reach{/g} takes {g|Encyclopedia:Dice}1d6{/g} points of {g|Encyclopedia:Damage_Type}piercing damage{/g} + 1 point per two levels you possess in the class that gave you access to this domain. You can use this ability for a number of rounds per day equal to your level in the class that gave you access to this domain. These rounds do not need to be consecutive.
column2: Nalézáš útěchu v zeleni, můžeš pěstovat obranná trní a dokážeš komunikovat s rostlinami.
You find solace in the green, can grow defensive thorns, and can communicate with plants.

column1: Enlarge: As a {g|Encyclopedia:Swift_Action}swift action{/g} you can enlarge yourself for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Combat_Round}round{/g}, as if you were the target of the {g|SpellsEnlargePerson}enlarge person{/g} spell. You can use this power a number of times per day equal to 3 + your {g|Encyclopedia:Wisdom}Wisdom{/g} modifier.

Bramble Armor: At 6th level, you can cause a host of wooden thorns to burst from your skin as a {g|Encyclopedia:Free_Action}free action{/g}. While bramble armor is in effect, any foe striking you with a melee weapon without {g|Encyclopedia:Reach}reach{/g} takes {g|Encyclopedia:Dice}1d6{/g} points of {g|Encyclopedia:Damage_Type}piercing damage{/g} + 1 point per two levels you possess in the class that gave you access to this domain. You can use this ability for a number of rounds per day equal to your level in the class that gave you access to this domain. These rounds do not need to be consecutive.

Domain {g|Encyclopedia:Spell}Spells{/g}: {g|SpellsEntangle}entangle{/g}, {g|SpellsBarkskin}barkskin{/g}, {g|SpellsContagion}contagion{/g}, {g|SpellsThornBody}thorn body{/g}, {g|SpellsVinetrap}vinetrap{/g}, {g|SpellsBeastShapeIV}beast shape IV{/g} (shambling mound), {g|SpellsChangestaff}changestaff{/g}, {g|SpellsMindBlank}mind blank{/g}, {g|SpellsCommunalMindBlank}mind blank, communal{/g}.
column2: Nalézáš útěchu v zeleni, můžeš pěstovat obranná trní a dokážeš komunikovat s rostlinami.
Doesn't have the following features: Bloodline (Sorcerer or Eldritch Scion or Bloodrager)

column1: Has one of the following features:
Draconic Bloodline — Black
Draconic Bloodline — Blue
Draconic Bloodline — Brass
Draconic Bloodline — Bronze
Draconic Bloodline — Copper
Draconic Bloodline — Gold
Draconic Bloodline — Green
Draconic Bloodline — Red
Draconic Bloodline — Silver
Draconic Bloodline — White
column2: Nejsi nositelem některého z následujících rysů: Bloodline (Sorcerer nebo Eldritch Scion nebo Bloodrager)

At 4th level, a drovier can imbue her allies (including herself ) with an aspect of a wild animal. As a {g|Encyclopedia:Standard_Actions}standard action{/g}, she chooses an animal totem and grants the abilities of that totem to every ally within 30 feet. This otherwise functions like the spell {g|SpellsAnimalAspect}animal aspect{/g}. She can use this ability for 10 minutes per druid level each day. This duration does not need to be consecutive, but it must be used in 10-minute increments. If she uses the ability to grant a new aspect, any previous aspect immediately ends.

column1: At 6th level, the drovier's communal aspect ability grants the benefits of the spell {g|SpellsGreaterAnimalAspect}animal aspect, greater{/g}.
At 8th level, the drovier can choose to grant her allies the benefits of the spell {g|SpellsAspectOfTheFalcon}aspect of the falcon{/g} instead of an animal aspect.
At 10th level, the drovier can choose to grant her allies the benefits of the spell {g|SpellsAspectOfTheBear}aspect of the bear{/g} instead of an animal aspect.
At 12th level, the drovier can choose to grant her allies the benefits of the spell {g|SpellsAspectOfTheStag}aspect of the stag{/g} instead of an animal aspect.
At 14th level, the drovier can choose to grant her allies the benefits of the spell {g|SpellsAspectOfTheWolf}aspect of the wolf{/g} rather than an animal aspect.
At 20th level, the drovier can use this ability at will.
This replaces wild shape.
column2: Na 4. úrovni může drovier vnést do svých spojenců (včetně sebe) aspekt divokého zvířete. Jako {g|Encyclopedia:Standard_Actions}standard action{/g} vybere zvířecí totem a udělí schopnosti toho totemu každému spojenci do 30 stop. Jinak toto funguje jako kouzlo {g|SpellsAnimalAspect}animal aspect{/g}. Tuto schopnost může použít 10 minut na úroveň druida denně. Toto trvání nemusí být souvislé, ale musí být využito v 10minutových úsecích. Pokud použije schopnost k udělení nového aspektu, jakýkoli předchozí aspekt okamžitě končí.

You become a medium fire elemental. You gain a +4 {g|Encyclopedia:Size}size{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} to your {g|Encyclopedia:Dexterity}Dexterity{/g}, a +3 form natural armor bonus to {g|Encyclopedia:Armor_Class}AC{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:Energy_Resistance}resist{/g} fire 20, and {g|Encyclopedia:Energy_Vulnerability}vulnerability{/g} to cold. Your movement {g|Encyclopedia:Speed}speed{/g} is increased by 20 feet. You also gain one {g|Encyclopedia:Dice}1d6{/g} slam attack and the burn ability.

column1: Burn: A fire elemental deals 1d6 {g|Encyclopedia:Energy_Damage}fire damage{/g} in addition to {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage{/g} dealt on a successful hit in melee. Those affected by the burn ability must also succeed at a {g|Encyclopedia:Saving_Throw}Reflex save{/g} or catch fire, taking 1d6 damage each {g|Encyclopedia:Combat_Round}round{/g} for an additional 1d4 rounds. Creatures that hit a burning creature with {g|Encyclopedia:NaturalAttack}natural weapons{/g} or {g|Encyclopedia:UnarmedAttack}unarmed attacks{/g} take fire damage as though hit by the burning creature and must succeed at a Reflex save to avoid catching fire.
column2: Stáváš se středním ohnivým elementálem. Získáváš +4 {g|Encyclopedia:Size}size{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} k tvé {g|Encyclopedia:Dexterity}Dexterity{/g}, +3 přirozený bonus k brnění z formy k {g|Encyclopedia:Armor_Class}AC{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:Energy_Resistance}resist{/g} oheň 20 a {g|Encyclopedia:Energy_Vulnerability}vulnerability{/g} ke studu. Tvá pohybová {g|Encyclopedia:Speed}speed{/g} se zvyšuje o 20 stop. Získáváš také jeden {g|Encyclopedia:Dice}1d6{/g} rázový útok a schopnost hoření.

You become a small fire elemental. You gain a +2 {g|Encyclopedia:Size}size{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} to your {g|Encyclopedia:Dexterity}Dexterity{/g}, a +2 form natural armor bonus to {g|Encyclopedia:Armor_Class}AC{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:Energy_Resistance}resist{/g} fire 20, and {g|Encyclopedia:Energy_Vulnerability}vulnerability{/g} to cold. Your movement {g|Encyclopedia:Speed}speed{/g} is increased by 20 feet. You also gain one {g|Encyclopedia:Dice}1d4{/g} slam attack and the burn ability.

column1: Burn: A fire elemental deals 1d4 {g|Encyclopedia:Energy_Damage}fire damage{/g} in addition to {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage{/g} dealt on a successful hit in melee. Those affected by the burn ability must also succeed at a {g|Encyclopedia:Saving_Throw}Reflex save{/g} or catch fire, taking 1d4 damage each {g|Encyclopedia:Combat_Round}round{/g} for an additional 1d4 rounds. Creatures that hit a burning creature with {g|Encyclopedia:NaturalAttack}natural weapons{/g} or {g|Encyclopedia:UnarmedAttack}unarmed attacks{/g} take fire damage as though hit by the burning creature and must succeed at a Reflex save to avoid catching fire.
column2: Stáváš se malým ohnivým elementálem. Získáváš +2 {g|Encyclopedia:Size}size{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} k tvé {g|Encyclopedia:Dexterity}Dexterity{/g}, +2 bonus přirozeného brnění k {g|Encyclopedia:Armor_Class}AC{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:Energy_Resistance}resist{/g} vůči ohni 20 a {g|Encyclopedia:Energy_Vulnerability}vulnerability{/g} vůči chladu. Tvá {g|Encyclopedia:Speed}speed{/g} se zvýší o 20 stop. Také získáváš jeden {g|Encyclopedia:Dice}1d4{/g} slam útok a schopnost Spálení.

You become a medium water elemental. You gain a +4 {g|Encyclopedia:Size}size{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} to your {g|Encyclopedia:Constitution}Constitution{/g}, a +5 form natural armor bonus to {g|Encyclopedia:Armor_Class}AC{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:Energy_Resistance}resist{/g} cold 20, and {g|Encyclopedia:Energy_Vulnerability}vulnerability{/g} to fire. Your movement {g|Encyclopedia:Speed}speed{/g} is reduced by 10 feet. You also gain one {g|Encyclopedia:Dice}1d8{/g} slam attack and the freeze ability.

column1: Freeze: A water elemental deals 1d6 {g|Encyclopedia:Energy_Damage}cold damage{/g} in addition to {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage{/g} dealt on a successful hit in melee. Those affected by the freeze ability must also succeed at a {g|Encyclopedia:Saving_Throw}Reflex save{/g} or start freezing, taking 1d6 damage each {g|Encyclopedia:Combat_Round}round{/g} for an additional 1d4 rounds. Creatures that hit a freezing creature with {g|Encyclopedia:NaturalAttack}natural weapons{/g} or {g|Encyclopedia:UnarmedAttack}unarmed attacks{/g} take cold damage as though hit by the freezing creature and must succeed at a Reflex save to avoid freezing.
column2: Stáváš se středním vodním elementálem. Získáváš +4 {g|Encyclopedia:Size}size{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} k tvé {g|Encyclopedia:Constitution}Constitution{/g}, +5 bonus přirozeného brnění k {g|Encyclopedia:Armor_Class}AC{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:Energy_Resistance}resist{/g} vůči chladu 20 a {g|Encyclopedia:Energy_Vulnerability}vulnerability{/g} vůči ohni. Tvá {g|Encyclopedia:Speed}speed{/g} se snižuje o 10 stop. Také získáváš jeden {g|Encyclopedia:Dice}1d8{/g} slam útok a schopnost Zmrazení.

column1: Type: utility
Burn: 0
You gain an amount of electricity {g|Encyclopedia:Energy_Resistance}resistance{/g} equal to twice your current amount of burn.
Type: utility
Burn: 1
Prerequisites: enveloping winds
You use wind to buffet yourself away from area {g|Encyclopedia:Attack}attacks{/g}. Until the next time your burn is removed, you gain evasion ability.
Evasion: Whenever you make a {g|Encyclopedia:Saving_Throw}Reflex saving throw{/g} to determine whether you take half {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage{/g}, a successful save results in no damage.
Type: simple blast
Level: —
Burn: 0
Blast Type: physical
Damage: {g|Encyclopedia:Damage_Type}bludgeoning{/g}
You batter a single foe with a gust of air.
Type: utility
Burn: —

When using air blasts, air wild talents, or composite blasts that include air, double the blast's effective range. This effect applies after altering the range due to effects such as the extended range infusion. This doubles only the blast's effective range, not the area of effect for infusions like cloud and cyclone.
Type: utility
Level: 2
Burn: —
{g|Encyclopedia:Saving_Throw}Saving Throw{/g}: none
{g|Encyclopedia:Spell_Resistance}Spell Resistance{/g}: none
Prerequisites: kinetic healer wild talent, aasimar

Through your connection to the celestial planes, you have learned to draw angelic essence into your {g|Encyclopedia:Healing}healing{/g}. When you use kinetic healer, the target of the healing gains the benefits of {g|SpellsProtectionFromEvil}protection from evil{/g} for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Combat_Round}round{/g}.
Type: utility
Level: 1
Burn: 0

You can create a light breeze that blows against a creature from a direction of your choice that follows the target wherever it goes. The breeze grants the subject a +2 {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} on {g|Encyclopedia:Saving_Throw}saves{/g} against very hot conditions, severe heat, breath weapons, and cloud vapors and gases (such as {g|SpellsCloudkill}cloudkill{/g}, {g|SpellsStinkingCloud}stinking cloud{/g}, and inhaled poisons). This wild talent doesn't function without air or while underwater. You can have only one such breeze active at any one time.
Type: form infusion
Level: 5
Burn: 3
Prerequisites: kinetic blade
Associated Blasts: any
{g|Encyclopedia:Saving_Throw}Saving Throw{/g}: none

You create a kinetic blade and swing it in an arc around you, making a single {g|Encyclopedia:Attack}attack{/g} against all foes within {g|Encyclopedia:Reach}reach{/g} as if kinetic blade was a reach weapon. The blade vanishes instantly after the whirlwind.
Type: form infusion
Level: 5
Burn: 3
Prerequisites: kinetic blade
Associated Blasts: any
{g|Encyclopedia:Saving_Throw}Saving Throw{/g}: none

You create a kinetic blade and swing it in an arc around you, making a single {g|Encyclopedia:Attack}attack{/g} against all foes within a 10 feet radius as if with kinetic blade. The blade vanishes instantly after the whirlwind.
Type: composite blast
Level: —
Burn: 2
Prerequisites: air blast, cold blast
Blast Type: physical
Damage: half {g|Encyclopedia:Damage_Type}piercing{/g}, half {g|Encyclopedia:Energy_Damage}cold{/g}
You unleash a directed blizzard at a single target.
Type: composite blast
Level: —
Burn: 2
Prerequisites: primary element (fire), expanded element (fire)
Blast Type: energy
Damage: {g|Encyclopedia:Energy_Damage}fire{/g}
You unleash a concentrated blast of intense blue flame.
Type: substance infusion
Level: 2
Burn: 2
Associated Blasts: earth, magma, metal, mud
You bowl your foes over with the sheer mass of your kinetic blast.

Attempt a trip {g|Encyclopedia:Combat_Maneuvers}combat maneuver{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Check}check{/g} against each target {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damaged{/g} by your infused blast, using your {g|Encyclopedia:Constitution}Constitution{/g} modifier instead of your {g|Encyclopedia:Strength}Strength{/g} modifier to determine your {g|Encyclopedia:CMB}Combat Maneuver Bonus{/g}.
Type: substance infusion
Level: 1
Burn: 1
Associated Blasts: blue flame, fire, magma, plasma
{g|Encyclopedia:Saving_Throw}Saving Throw{/g}: Reflex negates

Your kinetic blast ignites your foes. Whenever an infused blast hits a foe and penetrates its {g|Encyclopedia:Spell_Resistance}spell resistance{/g}, that foe catches on fire, regardless of whether it takes {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage{/g}. A foe that catches fire takes {g|Encyclopedia:Dice}1d6{/g} points of {g|Encyclopedia:Energy_Damage}fire damage{/g} each {g|Encyclopedia:Combat_Round}round{/g} until the fire is extinguished.
Type: utility
Burn: 0

You can galvanize the flow of electricity within your allies to enhance their {g|Encyclopedia:Speed}speed{/g}. This acts as {g|SpellsHaste}haste{/g} except it lasts for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Combat_Round}round{/g}. You can accept 1 point of burn to increase the duration to 1 round per kineticist level you possess.
Type: form infusion
Level: 7
Burn: 4
Prerequisites: extended range
Associated Blasts: earth, ice, metal
{g|Encyclopedia:Saving_Throw}Saving Throw{/g}: none or Reflex half; see text

You throw a volatile sphere of solid matter that shatters into countless shards. Attempt a ranged {g|Encyclopedia:Attack}attack roll{/g} against a target within 50 feet. If you hit, the target takes your kinetic blast {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage{/g} with no saving throw. All other creatures within a 20-foot burst take half the normal amount of damage and can attempt a Reflex save to reduce that damage by half again. If the attack misses its target, the blast has no effect.
The saving throw {g|Encyclopedia:DC}DC{/g} is {g|Encyclopedia:Dexterity}Dexterity{/g}-based.
column2: Údaj o záchranném hodu {g|Encyclopedia:DC}DC{/g} je založen na {g|Encyclopedia:Dexterity}Dexterity{/g}.

If she has both hands free, a kineticist can gather energy or elemental matter as a {g|Encyclopedia:Move_Action}move action{/g}. Gathering power in this way allows the kineticist to reduce the total burn cost of a blast wild talent she uses in the same {g|Encyclopedia:Combat_Round}round{/g} by 1 point. The kineticist can instead gather power for 1 full round in order to reduce the total burn cost of a blast wild talent used on her next turn by 2 points (to a minimum of 0 points). If she does so, she can also gather power as a move action during her next turn to reduce the burn cost by a total of 3 points. This ability can never reduce the burn cost of a wild talent below 0 points.

column1: Type: composite blast
Level: —
Burn: 2
Prerequisites: primary element (earth), expanded element (earth)
Blast Type: physical
Damage: {g|Encyclopedia:Damage_Type}bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing{/g}
You shape metal into clumps, shards, or blades and send them flying.
column2: Tvaruješ kov do hrudek, střepů či čepelí a posíláš je létat.

column1: Type: composite blast
Level: —
Burn: 2
Prerequisites: earth blast, water blast
Blast Type: physical
Damage: {g|Encyclopedia:Damage_Type}bludgeoning{/g}
You infuse your water into the earth to create a powerful ball of mud and slam a single foe.
column2: Vstřebáš svou vodu do země, vytvoříš mohutnou kouli bláta a uhodíš s ní jediného nepřítele.

column1: Type: composite blast
Level: —
Burn: 2
Prerequisites: air blast, fire blast
Blast Type: physical
Damage: half {g|Encyclopedia:Damage_Type}bludgeoning{/g}, half {g|Encyclopedia:Energy_Damage}fire{/g}
You launch a gust of air and then use your fire to superheat the gust into plasma just as it strikes a single foe.
column2: Vyšleš nápor vzduchu a pak použiješ svůj oheň k přehřátí náporu na plazmu právě v momentu, kdy zasáhne jediného nepřítele.

column1: Type: substance infusion
Level: 1
Burn: 1
Associated Blasts: air, blizzard, charged water, earth, magma, metal, mud, sandstorm, steam, water
{g|Encyclopedia:Saving_Throw}Saving Throw{/g}: none

The momentum of your kinetic blast knocks foes back. Attempt a bull rush {g|Encyclopedia:Combat_Maneuvers}combat maneuver{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Check}check{/g} against each target {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damaged{/g} by your infused blast, using your {g|Encyclopedia:Constitution}Constitution{/g} modifier instead of your {g|Encyclopedia:Strength}Strength{/g} modifier to determine your {g|Encyclopedia:CMB}Combat Maneuver Bonus{/g}.
Type: composite blast
Level: —
Burn: 2
Prerequisites: air blast, earth blast
Blast Type: physical
Damage: {g|Encyclopedia:Damage_Type}piercing and slashing{/g}
You use your air to churn up sand, firing a flensing gust at a foe.
column2: Použiješ vzduch, aby rozvířil písek, a vystřelíš řežoucí nápor na nepřítele.

column1: Type: utility
Level: 2
Burn: —
Prerequisites: burning infusion

Over time, your burning infusion sears away your foe's fire {g|Encyclopedia:Energy_Resistance}resistance{/g}. When you {g|Encyclopedia:Dice}roll{/g} burn {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage{/g} from burning infusion against a foe, decrease the foe's fire resistance by an amount equal to the unmodified burn damage; don't apply fire resistance to this roll for the purpose of determining the reduction. This decrease lasts for a number of {g|Encyclopedia:Combat_Round}rounds{/g} equal to 1/2 your kineticist level.
These decreases stack, to a minimum resistance of 0.
column2: Tato snížení se sčítají až na minimální odolnost 0.

column1: Type: defense
Level: —
Burn: 0

Your body becomes painfully hot. Whenever a creature hits you with a {g|Encyclopedia:NaturalAttack}natural attack{/g} or an {g|Encyclopedia:UnarmedAttack}unarmed strike{/g}, that creature takes 1 point of {g|Encyclopedia:Energy_Damage}fire damage{/g} per 4 kineticist levels you possess (minimum 1 point of fire damage). A creature in a grapple with you takes double this amount of damage at the end of each of its turns.

By accepting 1 point of burn, you can increase this damage by 1 point per 4 kineticist levels you possess until the next time your burn is removed. You can increase the damage in this way up to seven times.
column2: Přijetím 1 bodu hoření můžeš zvýšit toto poškození o 1 bod za každé 4 úrovně kineticisty, které máš, až do dalšího odebrání hoření. Toto zvýšení můžeš provést až sedmkrát.

column1: Type: defense
Level: —
Burn: 0

You surround yourself with a shroud of water, ice, or both that protects you from harm. The shroud can either cover your body, functioning as armor, or float around you and block {g|Encyclopedia:Attack}attacks{/g}, functioning as a shield. It grants either a +4 armor {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} to {g|Encyclopedia:Armor_Class}AC{/g} or a +2 shield bonus to AC, and you can change the type of bonus as a {g|Encyclopedia:Standard_Actions}standard action{/g}. This bonus increases by 1 for every 4 kineticist levels you possess beyond 2nd. By accepting 1 point of burn, You can increase the bonus by 1 until the next time your burn is removed. You can increase the bonus multiple times in this way, but it can't be increased by more than 50% of its starting value.
When you change the shroud to grant a shield bonus, any bonus in excess of this limit doesn't apply, but it remains if you change the shroud's bonus type again.
column2: Když změníš závoj na udílení štítového bonusu, jakýkoli bonus přesahující tento limit se neuplatní, avšak zůstane, pokud znovu změníš typ bonusu závoje.

column1: Type: utility
Burn: 0
{g|Encyclopedia:Saving_Throw}Saving Throw{/g}: Reflex negates
{g|Encyclopedia:Spell_Resistance}Spell Resistance{/g}: no

As a {g|Encyclopedia:Standard_Actions}standard action{/g}, you call forth slippery water or ice, creating any of the effects of the {g|SpellsGrease}grease{/g} spell for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Combat_Round}round{/g}. You can accept 1 point of burn at the start of your next turn to extend the duration to 1 minute per kineticist level you possess.
Type: utility
Level: 5
Burn: 1

You breathe a semblance of life into elemental matter, which takes the form of a Medium elemental of any of your elements as if summoned by {g|SpellsSummonMonsterIV}summon monster IV{/g} with a {g|Encyclopedia:Caster_Level}caster level{/g} equal to your kineticist level. At 12th level, you can choose to form a Large elemental as if by {g|SpellsSummonMonsterV}summon monster V{/g}; at 14th level, you can choose to form a Huge elemental as if by {g|SpellsSummonMonsterVI}summon monster VI{/g}; at 16th level, you can choose to form a greater elemental as if by {g|SpellsSummonMonsterVII}summon monster VII{/g}; and at 18th level, you can choose to form an elder elemental as if by {g|SpellsSummonMonsterVIII}summon monster VIII{/g}.
Type: form infusion
Level: 2
Burn: 2
Associated Blasts: any
{g|Encyclopedia:Saving_Throw}Saving Throw{/g}: Reflex negates (see text)

You throw a long, roughly 5-foot-by-10-foot spindle of elemental matter or energy up to 30 feet away, damaging all creatures within any two adjacent 5-foot squares unless they succeed at a Reflex save. An energy blast infused with spindle deals its normal {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage{/g} to each target, while a physical blast infused with spindle deals half its normal damage to each target.
The saving throw {g|Encyclopedia:DC}DC{/g} is {g|Encyclopedia:Dexterity}Dexterity{/g}-based.
Type: form infusion
Level: 4
Burn: 3
Associated Blasts: blood, charged water, water
{g|Encyclopedia:Saving_Throw}Saving Throw{/g}: Reflex half
You diffuse your kinetic blast to spray out wildly. All creatures in a 30-foot cone take half your normal amount of blast {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage{/g}.
The saving throw {g|Encyclopedia:DC}DC{/g} is {g|Encyclopedia:Dexterity}Dexterity{/g}-based.
Type: composite blast
Level: —
Burn: 2
Prerequisites: fire blast, water blast
Blast Type: physical
Damage: half {g|Encyclopedia:Damage_Type}bludgeoning{/g}, half {g|Encyclopedia:Energy_Damage}fire{/g}
You use your fire to superheat water into steam just as it strikes.

column2: A dark elementalist's base {g|Encyclopedia:Saving_Throw}Will save{/g} bonus from the kineticist class is equal to 2 + 1/2 her kineticist level, and her base Reflex and Fortitude save bonuses are equal to 1/3 her kineticist level. She gains all Knowledge and Lore skills as class {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}skills{/g}.

column1: A dark elementalist uses her {g|Encyclopedia:Intelligence}Intelligence{/g} modifier instead of her {g|Encyclopedia:Constitution}Constitution{/g} modifier to determine her {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage{/g} with wild talents, the {g|Encyclopedia:DC}DCs{/g} of Constitution-based wild talents, the durations of wild talents with Constitution-based durations, her {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} on {g|Encyclopedia:Concentration}concentration{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Check}checks{/g} for wild talents, and any other Constitution-based effects of all her wild talents.
This alters the kineticist's class skills and base saving throws and the key {g|Encyclopedia:Ability_Scores}ability score{/g} of wild talents.
column2: Základní bonus jejího {g|Encyclopedia:Saving_Throw}Will save{/g} z třídy kineticist je roven 2 + 1/2 její úrovně kineticistky, a její základní bonusy na Reflex a Fortitude jsou rovny 1/3 její úrovně kineticistky. Získává všechny dovednosti Knowledge a Lore jako třídní {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}skills{/g}.

Starting at 3rd level, the kinetic knight gains resolve that he can call upon to endure even the most devastating wounds and afflictions. He can use this ability once per day at 3rd level, plus one additional time per day for every two kinetic knight levels beyond 3rd.

column1: Determined: As a {g|Encyclopedia:Standard_Actions}standard action{/g}, the kinetic knight can spend one use of his resolve to remove the {g|ConditionFatigued}fatigued{/g}, {g|ConditionShaken}shaken{/g}, or {g|ConditionSickened}sickened{/g} condition. If the kinetic knight is at least 11th level, he can alternatively remove the {g|ConditionExhausted}exhausted{/g}, {g|ConditionFrightened}frightened{/g}, {g|ConditionNauseated}nauseated{/g}, or {g|ConditionStaggered}staggered{/g} condition.

Resolute: Whenever the kinetic knight is required to make a {g|Encyclopedia:Saving_Throw}Fortitude or Will save{/g}, he can spend one use of his resolve as an immediate {g|Encyclopedia:CA_Types}action{/g} to {g|Encyclopedia:Dice}roll{/g} twice and take the better result.
This ability replaces the kineticist infusion gained at 3rd level and supercharge.
column2: Od 3. úrovně získává kinetický rytíř odhodlání, k němuž může přistoupit, aby vydržel i nejzhoubnější rány a postižení. Tuto schopnost může použít jednou za den na 3. úrovni, plus jednou navíc za den za každé dva stupně kinetického rytíře nad 3.

At 1st level, the magus gains a reservoir of mystical arcane energy that he can draw upon to fuel his powers and enhance his weapon. This arcane pool has a number of points equal to 1/2 his magus level (minimum 1) + his {g|Encyclopedia:Intelligence}Intelligence{/g} modifier. The pool refreshes once per day when the magus prepares his {g|Encyclopedia:Spell}spells{/g}.

column1: At 1st level, a magus can expend 1 point from his arcane pool as a {g|Encyclopedia:Swift_Action}swift action{/g} to grant any weapon he is holding a +1 enhancement {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} for 1 minute. For every four levels beyond 1st, the weapon gains another +1 enhancement bonus, to a maximum of +5 at 17th level. These bonuses can be added to the weapon, stacking with existing weapon enhancement to a maximum of +5. Multiple uses of this ability don't stack with themselves.

At 5th level, these bonuses can be used to add any of the following weapon properties: {g|EnhancementFlaming}flaming{/g}, {g|EnhancementFlamingBurst}flaming burst{/g}, {g|EnhancementFrost}frost{/g}, {g|EnhancementIcyBurst}icy burst{/g}, {g|EnhancementKeen}keen{/g}, {g|EnhancementShocking}shock{/g}, {g|EnhancementShockingBurst}shocking burst{/g}, or {g|EnhancementSpeed}speed{/g}.

Adding these properties consumes an amount of bonus equal to the property's base price modifier. These properties are added to any the weapon already has, but duplicates don't stack. If the weapon is not magical, at least a +1 enhancement bonus must be added before any other properties can be added. These bonuses and properties are decided when the arcane pool point is spent and cannot be changed until the next time the magus uses this ability. These bonuses do not function if the weapon is wielded by anyone other than the magus.
A magus can only enhance one weapon in this way at one time. If he uses this ability again, the first use immediately ends.
column2: Na 1. úrovni získává magus zásobu mystické arkánové energie, z níž může čerpat, aby napájel své schopnosti a vylepšoval svou zbraň. Tato arkánová zásoba má počet bodů rovnající se 1/2 jeho úrovně maguse (minimálně 1) + jeho {g|Encyclopedia:Intelligence}Intelligence{/g} modifikátoru. Zásoba se obnoví jednou denně, když magus připraví svá {g|Encyclopedia:Spell}spells{/g}.

The magus can add the {g|EnhancementAnarchic}anarchic{/g} property to a weapon enhanced with his arcane pool, but this consumes 2 points of enhancement {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} granted to this weapon.

column1: An anarchic weapon is infused with the power of chaos. It makes the weapon {g|Encyclopedia:Alignment}chaotic-aligned{/g} and thus overcomes the corresponding {g|Encyclopedia:Damage_Reduction}damage reduction{/g}. It deals an extra {g|Encyclopedia:Dice}2d6{/g} points of {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage{/g} against all creatures of lawful alignment.
column2: Magus může přidat {g|EnhancementAnarchic}anarchic{/g} vlastnost ke zbrani vylepšené svou arkánovou zásobou, ale to spotřebuje 2 body z poskytnutého bonusu k vylepšení této zbraně.

The magus can add the {g|EnhancementAxiomatic}axiomatic{/g} property to a weapon enhanced with his arcane pool, but this consumes 2 points of enhancement {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} granted to this weapon.

column1: An axiomatic weapon is infused with lawful power. It makes the weapon {g|Encyclopedia:Alignment}lawful-aligned{/g} and thus overcomes the corresponding {g|Encyclopedia:Damage_Reduction}damage reduction{/g}. It deals an extra {g|Encyclopedia:Dice}2d6{/g} points of {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage{/g} against creatures of chaotic alignment.
column2: Magus může přidat {g|EnhancementAxiomatic}axiomatic{/g} vlastnost ke zbrani vylepšené svou arkánovou zásobou, ale to spotřebuje 2 body z poskytnutého bonusu k vylepšení této zbraně.
The magus can spend 1 additional point to add the {g|EnhancementBane}bane{/g} property to a weapon enhanced with his arcane pool. All enemies count as designated foes for this weapon.

column1: A bane weapon excels against certain foes. Against a designated foe, the weapon's enhancement {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} is +2 better than its actual bonus. It also deals an extra {g|Encyclopedia:Dice}2d6{/g} points of {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage{/g} against such foes.
column2: Magus může utratit 1 dodatečný bod, aby přidal {g|EnhancementBane}bane{/g} vlastnost ke zbrani vylepšené svou arkánovou zásobou. Všichni nepřátelé se pro tuto zbraň počítají jako určení protivníci.

Each eldrich scion has a source of magic somewhere in her heritage that grants her {g|Encyclopedia:Spell}spells{/g}, bonus {g|Encyclopedia:Feat}feats{/g}, an additional class {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}skill{/g}, and other {g|Encyclopedia:Special_Abilities}special abilities{/g}. This source can represent a blood relation or an extreme event involving a creature somewhere in the family's past. For example, an eldrich scion might have a dragon as a distant relative or her grandfather might have signed a terrible contract with a devil. Regardless of the source, this influence manifests in a number of ways as the eldrich scion gains levels. An eldrich scion must pick one bloodline upon taking her first level of eldrich scion. Once made, this choice cannot be changed.

column1: Filled with magical power that screams for release, sorcery is not so much a calling as a blessing — or a curse. For some eldrich scions, this arcane birthright manifests in subtle and carefully controlled ways, assisting in their manipulation of others or the pursuit of lofty goals. For others, it is wild and unpredictable, the primal and explosive lashing out of a power greater than themselves.

At 3rd level, and every two levels thereafter, an eldrich scion learns an additional spell, derived from her bloodline. These spells are in addition to the number of spells given at new levels. These spells cannot be exchanged for different spells at higher levels.

At 7th level, and every six levels thereafter, an eldrich scion receives one bonus feat, chosen from a list specific to each bloodline. The eldrich scion must meet the prerequisites for these bonus feats.
column2: Každý eldrich scion má v rámci svého původu zdroj magie, který mu uděluje {g|Encyclopedia:Spell}spells{/g}, bonusové {g|Encyclopedia:Feat}feats{/g}, dodatečnou třídní {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}skill{/g} a jiné {g|Encyclopedia:Special_Abilities}special abilities{/g}. Tento zdroj může představovat pokrevní vazbu nebo extrémní událost s tvorem v minulosti rodu. Například eldrich scion může mít draka jako vzdáleného příbuzného nebo jeho dědeček mohl podepsat hroznou smlouvu s ďáblem. Bez ohledu na původ se tento vliv projeví mnoha způsoby s růstem úrovní. Eldrich scion musí při získání první úrovně eldrich scion zvolit jeden rodokmen. Jakmile je volba učiněna, nelze ji změnit.

column1: {g|Encyclopedia:Speed}Speed{/g}: 40 ft.

{g|Encyclopedia:Attack}Attacks{/g}: bite ({g|Encyclopedia:Dice}1d6{/g}), 2 claws (1d4)

At 7th level, a dire bear's size becomes Large and it gains Str +4, Dex –2, Con +4, +4 to its natural armor {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} to AC, and the {g|FeatureGrab}grabber{/g} ability with its claw attacks.

Bear Hug: Whenever a dire bear succeeds at a grapple {g|Encyclopedia:Combat_Maneuvers}combat maneuver{/g} against an enemy, it deals 2d8 + its Strength modifier {g|Encyclopedia:Damage_Type}bludgeoning damage{/g} to that enemy.

Special qualities: {g|Encyclopedia:Scent}scent{/g}
At 7th level, a dire boar's size becomes Large and it gains Str +8, Dex –2, Con +4, +2 to its natural armor {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} to AC, and the ferocity ability.

Boar Gore: A dire boar's gore attack, if it hits, makes the enemy bleed for 1d6 {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage{/g} each {g|Encyclopedia:Combat_Round}round{/g}. At 7th level, the damage increases to 2d6.

{g|Encyclopedia:Attack}Attacks{/g}: bite ({g|Encyclopedia:Dice}1d6{/g} plus poison)

{g|Encyclopedia:Ability_Scores}Ability scores{/g}: {g|Encyclopedia:Strength}Str{/g} 9, {g|Encyclopedia:Dexterity}Dex{/g} 13, {g|Encyclopedia:Constitution}Con{/g} 13, {g|Encyclopedia:Intelligence}Int{/g} —, {g|Encyclopedia:Wisdom}Wis{/g} 10, {g|Encyclopedia:Charisma}Cha{/g} 2

Special attacks: poison (frequency: 1/{g|Encyclopedia:Combat_Round}round{/g} for 4 rounds; effect: 1d2 Dex {g|Encyclopedia:AbilityDamage}damage{/g}; cure: 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Saving_Throw}save{/g}; Constitution-based {g|Encyclopedia:DC}DC{/g})
{g|Encyclopedia:CMD}CMD{/g}: can't be tripped.
At 7th level, a hissing centipede's size becomes Large and it gains Str +8, Dex –2, Con +4, +2 to its natural armor {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} to AC, and a tail attack (1d2 plus trip).
This animal companion can't be used as a mount.
{g|Encyclopedia:Speed}Speed{/g}: 40 ft.
{g|Encyclopedia:Armor_Class}AC{/g}: +6 natural armor
{g|Encyclopedia:Attack}Attacks{/g}: bite ({g|Encyclopedia:Dice}1d6{/g} plus trip)

{g|Encyclopedia:Ability_Scores}Ability scores{/g}: {g|Encyclopedia:Strength}Str{/g} 13, {g|Encyclopedia:Dexterity}Dex{/g} 17, {g|Encyclopedia:Constitution}Con{/g} 15, {g|Encyclopedia:Intelligence}Int{/g} 2, {g|Encyclopedia:Wisdom}Wis{/g} 12, {g|Encyclopedia:Charisma}Cha{/g} 6
Special qualities: {g|Encyclopedia:Scent}scent{/g}
At 7th level, a riding dog's size becomes Large and it gains Str +8, Dex –2, Con +4, and +2 to its natural armor {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} to AC.

Good Boy: Whenever a riding dog successfully trips an enemy, that enemy receives an additional –2 {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g} to AC for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Combat_Round}round{/g}. At 7th level, the penalty increases to –4.

{g|Encyclopedia:Armor_Class}AC{/g}: +6 natural armor
{g|Encyclopedia:Attack}Attacks{/g}: gore ({g|Encyclopedia:Dice}1d8{/g}), 2 hooves (1d4)

{g|Encyclopedia:Ability_Scores}Ability scores{/g}: {g|Encyclopedia:Strength}Str{/g} 12, {g|Encyclopedia:Dexterity}Dex{/g} 17, {g|Encyclopedia:Constitution}Con{/g} 14, {g|Encyclopedia:Intelligence}Int{/g} 2, {g|Encyclopedia:Wisdom}Wis{/g} 15, {g|Encyclopedia:Charisma}Cha{/g} 5
At 7th level, an elk's size becomes Large and it gains Str +8, Dex –2, Con +4, +2 to its natural armor {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} to AC, and the powerful charge (gore, 2d6) ability.
Tripping Charge: Whenever an elk charges an enemy with its gore attack and hits, it also attempts a trip {g|Encyclopedia:Combat_Maneuvers}combat maneuver{/g} against that enemy.

{g|Encyclopedia:Attack}Attacks{/g}: bite ({g|Encyclopedia:Dice}1d4{/g}), 2 hooves (1d6)

{g|Encyclopedia:Ability_Scores}Ability scores{/g}: {g|Encyclopedia:Strength}Str{/g} 16, {g|Encyclopedia:Dexterity}Dex{/g} 13, {g|Encyclopedia:Constitution}Con{/g} 15, {g|Encyclopedia:Intelligence}Int{/g} 2, {g|Encyclopedia:Wisdom}Wis{/g} 12, {g|Encyclopedia:Charisma}Cha{/g} 6
Special qualities: {g|Encyclopedia:Scent}scent{/g}
At 4th level, a horse gains Str +2 and Con +2 and its hoof attacks become primary.
When riding a horse, you gain a +1 {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} to AC and on attack rolls against enemies of Medium size or smaller.

{g|Encyclopedia:Attack}Attacks{/g}: bite ({g|Encyclopedia:Dice}1d4{/g}), 2 claws (1d2)

Special qualities: {g|Encyclopedia:Scent}scent{/g}.
At 4th level, a leopard's size becomes Medium and it gains Str +4, Dex –2, Con +2, and the {g|FeaturePounce}pounce{/g} ability.

Sneak Attack: A leopard deals an additional 1d6 precision {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage{/g} to {g|Encyclopedia:Flat_Footed}flat-footed{/g} or {g|Encyclopedia:Flanking}flanked{/g} targets (2d6 at 4th level).
{g|Encyclopedia:Speed}Speed{/g}: 40 ft.
{g|Encyclopedia:Armor_Class}AC{/g}: +7 natural armor
{g|Encyclopedia:Attack}Attacks{/g}: gore ({g|Encyclopedia:Dice}1d8{/g}), slam (1d6)
